to.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseeded by 'href' prop if used

exact.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'exact' property; Superseeded by 'href' prop if used

append.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'append' property; Superseeded by 'href' prop if used

replace.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseeded by 'href' prop if used

href.desc: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace' props

target.desc: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only along with 'href' prop; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace' props
